DOC.detailed_description: 10 eye 10 patient underwent epi-LASK , epithelial flap create Amadeus II , epi-LASIK-LASIK microkeratome ( Ziemer ophthalmics system AG , Switzerland ) . A Visx star 4 system ( Visx , Santa Ana , CA , USA ) use perform laser ablation eye . A central scan total corneal thickness take confocal microscope ( Confoscan 4 , Fortune Technologies , Italy ) 2 week 1 month surgery . Corneal epithelial thickness Anterior stroma morphology analyze use NAVIS software V. 3.5.0 ( NIDEK , Multi-Instrument Diagnostic System , Japan ) .
